name: Poke Ball
description: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is thrown like a ball at a Pokemon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

name: Great Ball
description: A good, high-performance Poke Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball.

name: Ultra Ball
description: An ultra-high-performance Poke Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokemon than a Great Ball.

name: Master Ball
description: The best Poke Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokemon without fail.

name: Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Super Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 50 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Hyper Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 200 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Max Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It will fully restore the max HP of a single Pokemon.

name: Full Restore
description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokemon and heal any status conditions.

name: Revive
description: A medicine that can revive a fainted Pokemon. It will restore half of a fainted Pokemon's max HP.

name: Max Revive
description: A medicine that can revive a fainted Pokemon. It will fully restore a fainted Pokemon's max HP.

name: Antidote
description: A spray-type medicine for treating poisoning. It can be used to lift the effects of being poisoned from a single Pokemon.

name: Burn Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used to heal a single Pokemon suffering from a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to defrost a single frozen Pokemon.

name: Awakening
description: A spray-type medicine for treating sleep. It can be used to awaken a single Pokemon from the clutches of sleep.

name: Paralyz Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating paralysis. It can be used to free a single Pokemon that has been paralyzed.

name: Full Heal
description: A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used to heal all the status conditions of a single Pokemon.

name: Ether
description: A medicine that can be used to restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Max Ether
description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Elixir
description: A medicine that can be used to restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Max Elixir
description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the PP of all of the moves that have been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Rare Candy
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will instantly raise the level of a single Pokemon by one.

name: X Attack
description: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Defense
description: An item that sharply boosts the Defense stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description: An item that sharply boosts the Speed stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Special
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Accuracy
description: An item that sharply boosts the accuracy of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: Dire Hit
description: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: Guard Spec.
description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokemon for five turns after it is used in battle.

name: Repel
description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing in the wild for 100 steps after its use.

name: Super Repel
description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing in the wild for 200 steps after its use.

name: Max Repel
description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing in the wild for 250 steps after its use.

name: Escape Rope
description: A long and durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

name: Oran Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can restore its own HP by 10 points during battle.

name: Sitrus Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can restore its own HP by 25% during battle.

name: Lum Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.

name: Rawst Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from a burn on its own in battle.

name: Cheri Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from paralysis on its own in battle.

name: Pecha Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from poisoning on its own in battle.

name: Aspear Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its own in battle.

name: Chesto Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from sleep on its own in battle.

name: Leppa Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can restore 10 PP to a depleted move during battle.

name: Persim Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokemon. If a Pokemon holds one, it can recover from confusion on its own in battle.

name: Fire Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. The stone has a fiery orange heart.

name: Water Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of clear water.

name: Thunder Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.

name: Leaf Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has an unmistakable leaf pattern.

name: Moon Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as dark as the night sky.

name: Sun Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

name: Leftovers
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

name: Choice Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This curious headband boosts Attack by 50% but only allows the use of one move.

name: Shell Bell
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on a foe.

name: Focus Sash
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. It is consumed after use.

name: Life Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

name: Bicycle
description: A folding bicycle that enables a rider to get around much faster than with Running Shoes.

name: Old Rod
description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.

name: Good Rod
description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.

name: Super Rod
description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.

name: Town Map
description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location in the region.

name: Pokedex
description: A high-tech encyclopedia that automatically records data on all Pokemon that are seen or caught.

name: Exp. Share
description: Turning on this special device will allow all the Pokemon on your team to receive Exp. Points from battles.

name: HM01 Cut
description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

name: HM02 Fly
description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

name: HM03 Surf
description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

name: HM04 Strength
description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

name: HM05 Flash
description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate dark caves.

name: HM06 Rock Smash
description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

name: HM07 Waterfall
description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

name: HM08 Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

name: TM13 Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: TM24 Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: TM26 Earthquake
description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokemon around it.

name: TM29 Psychic
description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: TM35 Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: TM36 Sludge Bomb
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: TM38 Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: TM44 Rest
description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

name: TM45 Attract
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
